overview:
Chris Jermyn is Managing Director and Chief Executive Officer of Hot Shot Media and a former corporate adviser and venture capital professional.

Prior to his involvement with Hot Shot Media, leading their efforts to develop the novel ImageSocial online platform and create the worldâ€™s largest and most lucrative photo contest, Chris worked for a number of years with an ASX-listed boutique broking firm - initially as a Research Analyst, subsequently acting in such positions as Compliance Manager, Head of Research and later as the firmâ€™s Senior Corporate Adviser, specializing primarily in corporate finance, venture structuring, mergers and acquisitions and other advisory services for companies in the technology and related industries.

He has also served as a Political Adviser, and brings much insight with respect to industry collaboration as well as government grants and partnerships. In addition to studies in Economics, Commercial Law and Political Science at the University of Melbourne and Curtin University of Technology, Chris also has a substantial academic background in Financial Planning, Financial Markets and the Australian Regulatory Environment.

Chris serves on the boards of Hot Shot Media Limited (Singapore), Hot Shot Media, Inc (USA), Woophy, Inc (USA), Knowledge Nation, Inc (USA); and as Chairman of Terabyte Computer Products (Australia) Pty Ltd, a consultancy firm and significant shareholder of the Company.
